content: Sept 22 ConAgra Foods Inc reported a better-than-expected quarterly profit  helped by a 3.5 percent rise in sales in its commercial foods business  which makes ingredients for other manufacturers and restaurants.
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: UPDATE 1-ConAgra profit beats estimates on higher sales of food ingredients

content: Sept 22 ConAgra Foods Inc  the maker of Slim Jim beef jerky and Chef Boyardee pasta  reported a 1.1 percent rise in quarterly sales  helped by higher demand in its commercial foods business   which makes ingredients for other manufacturers and restaurants.
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: ConAgra sales rise on higher demand for food ingredients

content: ConAgra Foods Inc  has started talks with TreeHouse Foods Inc  and Post Holdings Inc  regarding the sale of its private label unit Ralcorp  which could be valued at around $3.5 billion  according to people familiar with the matter.
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: Exclusive: TreeHouse  Post join ConAgra's private label auction - sources

content: July 9 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 1000 GMT on Thursday:
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: ConAgra Foods Inc  has hired Centerview Partners to explore a sale of its private label unit Ralcorp  just two years after it acquired the troubled business with advice from the same investment bank  people familiar with the matter said.
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: ConAgra turns to Centerview again for advice on Ralcorp: sources

content: July 8 ConAgra Foods Inc said it will appoint two directors   including former Nestle USA CEO Bradley Alford  one of the three nominees of its second-largest shareholder Jana Partners LLC.
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: ConAgra appoints Jana Partners' nominee to board

content: July 8 ConAgra Foods Inc said it would add two directors  including a former Nestle executive nominated by Jana Partners LLC  three weeks after the activist investor took a stake in the food processing company and called for changes.
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: UPDATE 1-ConAgra appoints Jana Partners' nominee to board

content: July 8 ConAgra Foods Inc has hired Centerview Partners to explore a sale of its private label unit Ralcorp  just two years after it acquired the troubled business with advice from the same investment bank  people familiar with the matter said.
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: ConAgra turns to Centerview again for advice on Ralcorp -sources

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  July 01 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed the Long-term Issuer Default  Ratings (IDRs) for ConAgra Foods  Inc. (ConAgra) and its subsidiary  Ralcorp  Holdings  Inc. (Ralcorp) at 'BBB-' and has affirmed ConAgra's Short-term IDR at  'F3'. The Rating Outlook is Negative.  Fitch views ConAgra's announcement that it will exit the Private Brands  operation and essentially unwind the Ralcorp acquisition (completed just two  years ago
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: Fitch Affirms ConAgra's IDRs at 'BBB-/F3'; Outlook Negative

content: June 30 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2000 GMT on Tuesday:
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: July 1 The following are the top stories on the New York Times business pages. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: PRESS DIGEST- New York Times business news - July 1

content: ConAgra Foods Inc   the maker of Slim Jim beef jerky and Chef Boyardee pasta  said it planned to exit its struggling private label foods business as it seeks to boost profit margins and focus on its faster growing consumer foods segment.
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: ConAgra Foods to exit struggling private label business

content: * Shares up 1.7 pct   (Adds context  quotes from the earnings call  and updates share price)
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: UPDATE 4-ConAgra Foods to exit struggling private label business

content: June 30 ConAgra Foods Inc  the maker of Slim Jim beef jerky and Chef Boyardee pasta  said it would exit its struggling private label foods business and reported a 3.7 percent rise in quarterly sales.
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: ConAgra Foods to exit private label business

content: * Indexes down: Dow 0.27 pct  S&P 0.28 pct  Nasdaq 0.28 pct   (Updates to early afternoon)
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: US STOCKS-Wall St dips but indexes on track for best week in two months

content: Activist hedge fund Jana Partners LLC took a stake in ConAgra Foods Inc  and said it was prepared to nominate directors to the company's board to help address "persistent underperformance" since the acquisition of RalCorp in 2013.
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: Jana Partners takes stake in ConAgra  ready to nominate directors

name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: US STOCKS-Wall St falls as rally stalls; Greece eyed

content: June 18 Activist hedge fund Jana Partners LLC took a stake in ConAgra Foods Inc and said it was prepared to nominate directors to the company's board to help address "persistent underperformance" since the acquisition of RalCorp in 2013.
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Jana Partners takes stake in ConAgra  ready to nominate directors

content: June 18 Activist hedge fund Jana Partners LLC on Thursday disclosed a 7.2 percent stake in ConAgra Foods Inc   saying the Slim Jim Beef Jerky maker's shares were "undervalued".
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: Jana Partners picks up 7 pct stake in ConAgra

content: A unit of ConAgra Foods Inc pleaded guilty to a criminal misdemeanor and will pay $11.2 million to end a federal probe into a 2007 recall of peanut butter  including the Peter Pan brand  linked to a salmonella outbreak that sickened hundreds.
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: ConAgra pleads guilty  pays record fine tied to peanut butter recall

content: * U.S. says more than 700 sickened by salmonella taint   (Adds details of allegations  ConAgra comment  separate prosecution  byline)
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: UPDATE 1-ConAgra pleads guilty  pays record fine tied to peanut butter recall

content: May 20 A unit of ConAgra Foods Inc has pleaded guilty to a criminal misdemeanor and will pay $11.2 million to end a federal probe into a 2007 recall of peanut butter linked to a salmonella outbreak  court papers showed.
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: ConAgra enters guilty plea tied to 2007 peanut butter recall

content: ConAgra Foods Inc   the maker of Slim Jim beef jerky and Chef Boyardee pasta  reported a higher-than-expected quarterly profit due to cost cuts and the company raised its full-year earnings forecast.
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: ConAgra reports better-than-expected profit  raises forecast

content: March 26 ConAgra Foods Inc  the maker of Slim Jim beef jerky and Chef Boyardee pasta  reported a higher-than-expected quarterly profit due to cost cuts and the company raised its full-year earnings forecast.
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: UPDATE 1-ConAgra reports better-than-expected profit  raises forecast

content: March 26 ConAgra Foods Inc  the maker of Slim Jim beef jerky  reported a quarterly loss  hurt by a $1.3 billion charge in its private brands business.
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: ConAgra reports quarterly loss  lower sales

content: ConAgra Foods Inc   the maker of Slim Jim beef jerky and Chef Boyardee pasta  appointed former Hillshire Brands Co Chief Executive Sean Connolly its CEO  replacing Gary Rodkin.
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: ConAgra names Sean Connolly CEO  cuts profit forecast

content: Feb 12 ConAgra Foods Inc  the maker of Slim Jim beef jerky and Chef Boyardee pasta  appointed former Hillshire Brands Co Chief Executive Sean Connolly its CEO  replacing Gary Rodkin.
name: ConAgra Brands Inc
title: ConAgra names Sean Connolly CEO  cuts 2015 profit forecast
